thread.title: University Challenge Contestant Luke Dale Causes Stir With Incredible Outfit Choice
thread.title_full: University Challenge Contestant Luke Dale Causes Stir With Incredible Outfit Choice

author: Jasmin Gray
title: University Challenge Contestant Luke Dale Causes Stir With Incredible Outfit Choice
text:
University Challenge Contestant Luke Dale Causes Stir With Incredible Outfit Choice But is it more jockey or Flash Gordon? 06/02/2017 21:44 Jasmin Gray Students Reporter, The Huffington Post UK 
There have been some legendary outfits on University Challenge over the years. 
From psychedelic shirts to Sam Fairbrother‚Äôs famous black muscle tee , some incredible fashion choices have graced our screens on Monday evenings. 
But Edinburgh University‚Äôs Luke Dale took it to the next level last night when he donned a rather... interesting white and red sweater for the occasion. BBC University Challenge viewers were obsessed with contestant Luke Dale's unusual fashion choice 
As you might expect, University Challenge fans were quick to make comparisons: Yaay the first ever jockey on #UniversityChallenge with Mr Dale, bravo sir üëèüèºüëèüèº ‚Äî Nicholas Divall (@NDivall) February 6, 2017 Dale knew the answer to that question because, as the Flash he can run into the future and back again #universitychallenge ‚Äî Dudley Cruse (@dudleycruse) February 6, 2017 Dale is on Earth on a fact-finding mission. #UniversityChallenge pic.twitter.com/5zb8VDLPyt ‚Äî Alex Dale (@typofoto) February 6, 2017 Dale looks as though he's just come from appearing in a remake of Flash Gordon #UniversityChallenge ‚Äî Richard Pearmain (@Ooh_Matron) February 6, 2017 Dale: "I thought we were dressing as superheroes?"Team: "It was a joke!"Dale: "Wankers!" #UniversityChallenge pic.twitter.com/bIV6DSDNZD ‚Äî Vix (@3forlunch) February 6, 2017 
But one fan believes he‚Äôs cracked where the shirt has actually come from: #UniversityChallenge 10 seconds in and I identified Dale's 1975 retro 'Y' York City shirt. A Classic of its time. 
It‚Äôs not the first time Dale has caused a stir with his University Challenge wardrobe - when he appeared on the show back in November, viewers were worried he had wandered off the set of a 70‚Äôs sci-fi programme. 
Thankfully, Dale and his Edinburgh team stormed to victory against their competitors from Birmingham with a 220-125 win, meaning they are still in with a shot at the title. 
Can you imagine the amazing outfit Dale would wear if they made it through to the final? 
We can only dream.
